cbt_protocols.name: validate_and_reflect
cbt_protocols.purpose: Establish emotional alignment and psychological safety before cognitive intervention.
key_functions: Prepare the patient for deeper cognitive work
techniques: Normalizing emotional responses without reinforcing maladaptive beliefs
Clarifying discrepancies between stated feelings and lived impact

cbt_protocols.name: socratic_questioning
cbt_protocols.purpose: Facilitate insight through questioning to help patient draw their own conclusions rather than providing answers directly
key_functions: Surface hidden assumptions and logical gaps
techniques: Exploration of evidence, alternatives, and implications
Progressive deepening from surface thoughts to core beliefs

cbt_protocols.name: cognitive_reframing
cbt_protocols.purpose: Help patient evaluate evidence for and against their thoughts and beliefs that is blocked by their cognitive distortions by restructuring rigid thought patterns
key_functions: Reduce emotional distress linked to distorted appraisals
techniques: Evidence for versus evidence against analysis
Identification and labeling of cognitive distortions
